Synonym: CA1 lacunosum-moleculare radiatum perforant path associated cell
Comment: This class is still under review and requires changes before making it final. In the mean time
Hippocampus CA1 LM(R) PP neuron.Definition: CA1 lacunosum-moleculare radiatum PP neuron is a type of CA1 interneuron which is associated with perforant pathway. The cell bodies of these cells are in stratum radiatum or at the border of stratum radiatum and lacunosum-moleculare. The dendritic field reaches the alveus and covers all layers (Hajos & Mody, 1997; Vida et al. 1998).
